title: Stuck on setup
comment: Won't get past emergency SMS test

title: Good idea, easy to set up
comment: Would be amazing if it sent out your GPS location when panic was hit. And kept updateing the recipients of your location until turned off, also after panic is pressed the app should go into a kind of hidden mode, potentially stopping your assailants or kidnapers from turning off your phone, which would help lead to your recovery.

title: Hangs on SMS verification. Amateur night. Uninstalled.
Stuck at Test SMS
comment: It was working before but now it just gets stuck at the loading screenwhen testing sms

title: like it except its not working on my new phone
comment: assuming that since the update to the apk now it won't load on a new phone I installed it on. Perhaps have a look at it devs and see whats up with the app  worked on all previous phones however

title: Emergency sms freeze
comment: During intial set up, sends the text fine but won't move past the test. Just keeps saying "sending test sms".

title: Testing emergency SMS
comment: I agree with the statement below. I have an Android 2.3.5  AT&T and after I submit my # I get a message back almost immediately BUT THEN it says "Please Wait" and runs continously and won't stop. Why?? Can't seem to get any help from thier web site either. Very disappointed!

title: Great idea
comment: Only issue so far is that the "Please Wait" loading screen NEVER ends during the SMS test message during the setup wizard.
